text: @IvankaTrump Why would you post this, #IvankaTrump? Did you think the millions of people out of work bc of the #COVID19 #coronavirus are going to enjoy seeing you on vacation, now that THEIR FAMILIES can no longer take one?You actually POSED for this. You & the #Trump family are unbelievable.
